name: Out of S.P.A.C.E.
description:
you ran out of S.P.A.C.E bar, run out of space and go get some !

game made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 42 jam (and first time using Unity :3)

the theme was "Running out of space" as you may have noticed by looking at my game

run phase : you power your ship by running on an old running track / dance mat, and to keep on the rythm, hit the right arrow key when it comes on the trigger

ship phase : you control your ship to avoid colliding with asteroids

switch between these phases using a S.P.A.C.E. bar when it becomes too difficult but careful, you have only a few and you have to get alive out of space to get some more !

credit : 

cookies and additional art : sister Benjamine Smolinski

else : thöbe

using : 

Unity, Aseprite, Cubase, Trello
